api_list.name: get tiktok video full info
api_list.description:
Support Tiktok & Douyin.
Returns relevant information about querying video addresses, 
including high-definition watermark free video addresses, 
author information, 
background music information, 
views, 
likes, 
comments, 
etc- List Item

optional_parameters.description: Get HD Video(High bit rate). This increases the total request time a little.

optional_parameters.name: publish_time
optional_parameters.description:
0 - ALL
1 - Past 24 hours
7 - This week
30 - This month
90 - Last 3 months
180 - Last 6 months

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: Please refer to the region list interface for details

api_list.name: region list
api_list.description: the region list use in video search params
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-video-feature-summary.p.rapidapi.com/region"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-video-feature-summary.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
